pkgmetadata.longdescription: Representing Graphs as 'graph6', 'digraph6' or 'sparse6' Strings // Encode network data as strings of printable ASCII characters. Implemented functions include encoding and decoding adjacency matrices, edgelists, igraph, and network objects to/from formats 'graph6', 'sparse6', and 'digraph6'. The formats and methods are described in McKay, B.D. and Piperno, A (2014) doi:10.1016/j.jsc.2013.09.003.
